data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gan, Zhibin, Li, Xinzheng (2016): Lysmata leptodactylus, a new species of lysmatid shrimp (Crustacea: Decapoda: Caridea) from China. Zootaxa 4138 (1): 181-188, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4138.1.9
